Description: This mermaid style gown has a flare of flirty fun. It is an above the knee dress with sparkled accents and a beaded bodice. It features a low cut back to add to the drama of the dress. The gown then has a mermaid train that is open in the front for a chic flirty look. This dress is perfect for proms or other social events.
